faqs.question: How can I check my internet usage?
faqs.answer: Log in to your client dashboard to view real-time data usage and manage your plan effortlessly. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to stay informed about your internet consumption.

faqs.question: How do I pay my bill?
faqs.answer:
1. Go to your M-Pesa Menu.
2. Select Lipa na Mpesa.
3. Choose Paybill**.**
4. Enter 4092411 as the Paybill number.
5. Enter your registered phone number as the account number. e.g. 0700 000 000.
6. Enter the amount and your M-Pesa PIN, then send.

faqs.question: What happens if I pay for my subscription using a different number?
faqs.answer: If you use a different number, contact our support team. Provide the payment message and your registered account number. We will manually update your account.

faqs.question: How do I access the Selfcare portal?
faqs.answer:
1. Visit (https://mediatek.ispkenya.co.ke/user/).
2. Enter your registered phone number as both your User ID and Password.

faqs.question: How do I change my password?
faqs.answer: Contact our support team with the new password you want to set. We will update your password within 24 hours.

faqs.question: Why is my internet slow?
faqs.answer:
1. Check your current speed using (https://www.fast.com).
2. Ensure no other devices are downloading large files or streaming.
3. Restart your router and try connecting again.
4. If the issue persists, contact our support team for assistance.

faqs.question: Can I suspend my services while I'm out of town?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can temporarily pause your service. Contact our support team to arrange a suspension and avoid unnecessary charges.

faqs.question: I am moving to a new location, can I take my connection with me?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can transfer your connection. Contact our support team to schedule a relocation service. Note: Relocation fees may apply.

faqs.question: How do I place an order for your service?
faqs.answer: Call our sales team or visit one of our local offices.

faqs.question: Why do I have no internet?
faqs.answer:
1. Check if all cables are securely connected.
2. Restart your router.
3. Verify that your account is active by logging into the Selfcare portal.
4. Contact support if the problem continues.

faqs.question: Are you offering any job opportunities?
faqs.answer: Visit our careers page on the website for current job openings. Submit your application via the contact form provided.

faqs.question: How can I improve my Wi-Fi signal?
faqs.answer: Place your router in a central location, away from obstructions. Ensure your router firmware is up to date. Limit the number of connected devices during high-traffic periods.

faqs.question: Where’s the best location for my Internet router?
faqs.answer: Place your router in an open area, preferably in the center of your home. Avoid placing it near large metal objects or electronics that could cause interference.

faqs.question: What is my current internet speed, and how do I find out?
faqs.answer: Check your speed by visiting (https://www.fast.com) or on the Selfcare portal.

faqs.question: Can I change my subscription package?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your package at any time. Contact our support team or use the Selfcare portal to make the change.

faqs.question: What are the reasons for rebooting my device?
faqs.answer: Rebooting can resolve connectivity issues and refresh your connection. It's recommended to reboot your router at least once a month for optimal performance.

faqs.question: How do I raise a Ticket for support?
faqs.answer:
1. Log onto (https://mediatek.ispkenya.co.ke/user/).
2. Go to the "Help & Support" section.
3. Click on "Create Ticket" and fill out the necessary details.
4. Submit the ticket, and our support team will respond promptly.
